name: ITM Mobile
tag_list: apps, audience-response, mobile-app, event, exhibition, expo, convention, meeting, conference, meeting-technology, trade-show, destination-app, web-app, native-app, off-line-app, qr-code, indoor-positioning, web-signage, web-tv, attendee-interaction, mess
overview:
ITM Mobile, a US Company, is a joint venture between ITmaskinen AB, one of the leading IT companies in Sweden with extensive experience developing traditional IT as well as mobile technology solutions and HTH business solutions LLC, a sales & marketing representation company with focus on innovative meetings technology, mobile apps and web-solutions.

“We’ve created mobile solutions, long before they became the rage”

After years of experience working with mobile technology, as well as listening to and engaging with our customers – ITM Mobile has gained tremendous expertise when it comes to developing, designing and delivering, innovative meeting and business apps.

We are frequent speakers at events and seminars around the world on the topics of mobile technology trends and ecstatic about our continuous and profitable growth.

ITM Mobile of today, consist of more than 40 mobile technology and meeting industry experts on three continents, all with a shared passion for effective, efficient and easy-to-use, mobile apps and event solutions.

At ITM Mobile, we are constantly improving our product and service offerings: • in 2010 we introduced our MINT Conference & Event App at Microsoft TechDays • in 2011 we launched a “DIY” (do-it-yourself) version of MINT • also in 2011, ITM Mobile with our partner Qubulus introduced MINT QPS, the first indoor event positioning system using fingerprint technology

Our MINT QPS allows the app users to see their own position as well as that of their contacts on a truly interactive floor plan and the organizer and exhibitors to view a “heat-map” that shows flow of traffic within the venue. One of the many unique benefits of this product is that it works in between different floors.

Stay tuned for what we are launching now in 2012!
